member.name: F:Discord.Commands.ParameterType.Multiple
member.summary: Catches a zero or more optional parameters.

member.name: F:Discord.Commands.ParameterType.Unparsed
member.summary: Catches all remaining text as a single optional parameter.

member.name: P:Discord.Commands.CommandServiceConfigBuilder.PrefixChar
member.summary: Gets or sets the prefix character used to trigger commands, if ActivationMode has the Char flag set.

member.name: P:Discord.Commands.CommandServiceConfigBuilder.AllowMentionPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets whether a message beginning with a mention to the logged-in user should be treated as a command.

member.name: P:Discord.Commands.CommandServiceConfigBuilder.CustomPrefixHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets a custom function used to detect messages that should be treated as commands. This function should a positive one indicating the index of where the in the message's RawText the command begins, and a negative value if the message should be ignored.

member.name: P:Discord.Commands.CommandServiceConfigBuilder.HelpMode
member.summary: Gets or sets whether a help function should be automatically generated.

member.name: P:Discord.Commands.CommandServiceConfigBuilder.ExecuteHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets a handler that is called on any successful command execution.

member.name: P:Discord.Commands.CommandServiceConfigBuilder.ErrorHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets a handler that is called on any error during command parsing or execution.

member.name: P:Discord.Commands.CommandServiceConfig.HelpMode
member.summary: Gets or sets whether a help function should be automatically generated.

member.name: F:Discord.Commands.HelpMode.Public
member.summary: Use the automatic help command and respond in the channel the command is used.

member.name: F:Discord.Commands.HelpMode.Private
member.summary: Use the automatic help command and respond in a private message.
